primary_questions.question: To stay an active premium member of the Learning Circle, you must commit to writing at least one blog a week, can do you this?
What kind of writing do you do most often?
What do you hope to get out of your membership?
What type of content can you contribute to the learning circle?
answers: not sure, excited to join and explore!

primary_questions.question: As a Learning Circle premuim member, we expect you to be engaged in the conversation! How many hours a week can you contribute to the Learning Circle?

alternate_questions.question: Have you contributed blog posts to other websites in the past?
How did you hear about the Learning Circle?
